name: Reveal a Danger

entries.result: An alarm is triggered or guardians are alerted
A path is blocked by a recent collapse
A rival or hostile denizen arrives
Resources are depleted or equipment fails
A clue is misleading or a false trail
You attract unwanted attention from within
A lurking horror reveals its presence
Roll twice and combine the threats

description: Complications that appear while exploring a site.

name: Discover a Feature

entries.result: Collapsed hall exposing a hidden chamber
Makeshift camp left by a previous delver

description: Details to flesh out chambers, passages, or rooms.
